com.snamp.connectors

Interface ManagementConnector

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractManagementConnector, ManagementConnectorBean

    public interface ManagementConnector
extends java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String>, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Represents management connector that exposes management attributes of the remote provider.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Roman Sakno

    • Method Detail

      • connectAttribute

        AttributeMetadata connectAttribute(java.lang.String id,
                                 java.lang.String attributeName,
                                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> options)
        Connects to the specified attribute.
        Parameters:
        id - A key string that is used to read attribute from this connector.
        attributeName - The name of the attribute.
        options - The attribute discovery options.
        Returns:
        The description of the attribute.

      • getAttribute

        java.lang.Object getAttribute(java.lang.String id,
                            TimeSpan readTimeout,
                            java.lang.Object defaultValue)
                              throws java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
        Returns the attribute value.
        Parameters:
        id - A key string that is used to read attribute from this connector.
        readTimeout - The attribute value read operation timeout.
        defaultValue - The default value of the attribute if it is real value is not available.
        Returns:
        The value of the attribute, or default value.
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - The attribute value cannot be read in the specified duration.

      • getAttributes

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getAttributes(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> output,
                                            TimeSpan readTimeout)
                                              throws java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
        Reads a set of attributes.
        Parameters:
        output - The dictionary with set of attribute keys to read and associated default values.
        readTimeout - The attribute value read operation timeout.
        Returns:
        The set of attributes ids really written to the dictionary.
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - The attribute value cannot be read in the specified duration.

      • setAttribute

        boolean setAttribute(java.lang.String id,
                   TimeSpan writeTimeout,
                   java.lang.Object value)
                     throws java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
        Writes the value of the specified attribute.
        Parameters:
        id - An identifier of the attribute,
        writeTimeout - The attribute value write operation timeout.
        value - The value to write.
        Returns:
        true if attribute set operation is supported by remote provider; otherwise, false.
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - The attribute value cannot be write in the specified duration.

      • setAttributes

        boolean setAttributes(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> values,
                    TimeSpan writeTimeout)
                      throws java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
        Writes a set of attributes inside of the transaction.
        Parameters:
        values - The dictionary of attributes keys and its values.
        writeTimeout -
        Returns:
        null, if the transaction is committed; otherwise, false.
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException

      • disconnectAttribute

        boolean disconnectAttribute(java.lang.String id)
        Removes the attribute from the connector.
        Parameters:
        id - The unique identifier of the attribute.
        Returns:
        true, if the attribute successfully disconnected; otherwise, false.

      • getAttributeInfo

        AttributeMetadata getAttributeInfo(java.lang.String id)
        Returns the information about the connected attribute.
        Parameters:
        id - An identifier of the attribute.
        Returns:
        The attribute descriptor; or null if attribute is not connected.

      • doAction

        java.lang.Object doAction(java.lang.String actionName,
                        Arguments args,
                        TimeSpan timeout)
                          throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException,
                                 java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
        Executes remote action.
        Parameters:
        actionName - The name of the action,
        args - The invocation arguments.
        timeout - The Invocation timeout.
        Returns:
        The invocation result.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
